data.name: Easy Simple Game
data.detailed_description:
Easy Simple Game is a platformer with high dinamics, a colorful pixel style and a short, but funny story. Go through all obstacles and find out what the Unsuspicious dude wants from you!

• Intence gameplay
• Accuracy is your all
• Place save points wherever you like
• Time slow with a fast shift
• Double jump, wall slide, fly
• Boss fights

Hello everybody!
It's my second game. It is a platformer too, but unlike the previous one, it is way shorter and focused on the gameplay, not the story. Actually, I made it in a pretty short amount of time, while working on another big and story-focused game. One day I'll release it too.
Have fun!

data.short_description: Meet the Unsuspicious dude, take a job from him and walk through deadly spikes, slimes and spinning blades. Sounds pretty simple, isn't it?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Anything with at least 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
